        public double matching(double[] ejemplo)

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(java.lang.Object a)
        Function to compare objects of the Rule class. Necessary to be able to use "sort" function It sorts in an decreasing order of confidence If equals, in an decreasing order of support If equals, in an decreasing order of time
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable
        Parameters:
        a - Rule object to compare with.
        Returns:
        1 if a is bigger, -1 if smaller and 0 otherwise.
